definition: a thin pointed piece of metal that is hammered into materials as a fastener, complete a pass
details:
noun
- a thin pointed piece of metal that is hammered into materials as a fastener
- horny plate covering and protecting part of the dorsal surface of the digits
- a former unit of length for cloth equal to 1/16 of a yard
verb
- complete a pass
= synonyms: complete
- take into custody
= synonyms: arrest
- attach something somewhere by means of nails
= example: attach something somewhere by means of nails
- hit hard
= synonyms: blast
- locate exactly
= synonyms: pinpoint
- succeed at easily
= synonyms: ace
- succeed in obtaining a position
= example: succeed in obtaining a position
= synonyms: peg, nail down
